entry.title: Sunday night: Wet flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few wet flurries beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
